abstract: Social networking has provided a window into negotiating process of United Auto Workers with automakers, even though talks still occur in private; communication is not only more instant and accurate, but has been extended to people previously left on sidelines, including retirees.
snippet: Although contract negotiations still take place in private, Web sites and social media have provided faster, more accurate and more inclusive communication.
lead_paragraph: Although contract negotiations still take place in private, Web sites and social media have provided faster, more accurate and more inclusive communication.

headline.main: Labor Talks in Detroit Go Social
headline.print_headline: Labor Talks In Detroit Go Social
headline.seo: Social Media Offer View Into U.A.W.’s Contract Talks
